author: Guest Writer
snippet: Eco-Girls support scheme is designed to train, equip and empower girls with practical bag design and making skills using recyclable and biodegradable materials.

author: Issie
snippet: A cleaner earth is the incentive for this new project. Find out new ways to spruce your home and save the earth while you're at it.
